sentence.Network_en: We tried to help you expedite your plans.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们尽力帮你加快实现你的计划。

sentence.Network_en: We have developed rapid order processing to expedite deliveries to customers.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们已创造了快速处理订单的方法以便迅速将货物送达顾客。

list.abs: 纸业专业英语词汇翻译(E) ... expansivity 膨胀性 expediting setting 快速凝固 experimental beater 实验室打浆机.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (in the sense 'perform quickly'): from Latin expedire 'extricate (originally by freeing the feet), put in order', from ex- 'out' + pes, ped- 'foot'

entry.def: If you expedite something, you cause it to be done more quickly.

example.ex: The government has been extremely reluctant to expedite investigations that might result in his trial...
example.tran: 当局极不情愿推进调查，因为其结果可能会让他接受审判。

example.ex: We tried to help you expedite your plans.
example.tran: 我们尽力帮你加快实现你的计划。

means.word_mean: 1. speed up the progress of; facilitate;

sentences.sentence: "I will try to expedite the matter"

auth_sentence.content: The government has promised to expedite relief efforts.
auth_sentence.res_content: The government has promised to expedite relief efforts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The government has promised to expedite relief efforts.

auth_sentence.content: It is hoped the Istanbul meeting will further expedite the process.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is hoped the Istanbul meeting will further expedite the process.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is hoped the Istanbul meeting will further expedite the process.

auth_sentence.content: The first is to expedite a transfer of a National Firearms Act firearm.
auth_sentence.res_content: The first is to expedite a transfer of a National Firearms Act firearm.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The first is to expedite a transfer of a National Firearms Act firearm.

sentences.en: The builders promised to expedite the repairs.
